headline: Charter Communications (CHTR) PT Slashed to $350 by Bernstein SocGen
summary: Charter Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHTR) is a leading American broadband and cable operator serving both residential and commercial clients, offering subscription-based internet, video, mobile, and voice services. It is one of the S&P 500 stocks with a low PE ratio. On September 10, Bernstein SocGen reaffirmed an Outperform rating on CHTR but trimmed the price target […]
